brand.essence: Where music meets faith — a joyful summer experience for young musicians growing together

voice.tone: Warm, energetic, sincere — like a trusted youth leader who's genuinely excited
do: Mix enthusiasm with substance — energy backed by purpose
Use short, punchy sentences for teens; provide reassuring detail for parents
Let photos and color do the emotional heavy lifting
dont: Don't be preachy or overly formal
Don't use churchy jargon that alienates newcomers
Don't use generic stock-photo language — keep it specific to MusicJam
Don't overload with text — this is a visual, musical brand

mood.description: Think warm summer evenings with guitars on a lawn, berry-coloured light filtering through trees. The palette is rooted in deep raspberry — rich and bold like jam itself — offset by clean whites and pops of leafy green. The overall feel is handmade yet polished: splatter textures, rounded shapes, and generous whitespace keep it youthful without being childish. Photography (when used) should show real teenagers making music together — candid, not posed.

colors.notes: Primary raspberry (#B5174A) is the brand anchor — use for CTAs, headings, and key accents. Green (#3EA66B) as secondary accent for positive actions (donate, social links) and decorative leaf motifs. Warm cream background (#FDF8F4) avoids sterile white while keeping high contrast. surfaceAlt is a pink-tinted card background that echoes the jam/berry theme.

typography.notes: Nunito: rounded, friendly sans-serif — great readability, supports Cyrillic and Latin. Caveat: handwritten feel for decorative headings and the 'jam' personality moments — mirrors the logo's playful lettering. Use Caveat sparingly: hero headline, section labels, pull quotes.

layout.notes: Generous radii keep the rounded, jam-blob aesthetic. Slightly narrower max-width (1120) for intimate, readable single-page feel.

components.name: Hero — Centred Splash
components.description: Full-width hero with logo centred on a warm background, tagline in Caveat, and a single CTA button. Optional background photo with overlay.

components.name: About — Icon Feature Grid
components.description: 2×3 grid of activity cards (vocal, instrumental, orchestra, choir, worship band, small groups) each with an icon, short title, and one-liner. Cards use surfaceAlt background with rounded corners.

components.name: History — Vertical Timeline
components.description: Vertical timeline with alternating left/right entries. Each node shows year, city name, and optional photo thumbnail. Timeline line in primary colour with berry-dot markers.

components.name: Merch — Product Cards
components.description: Horizontal scrollable row of merch cards. Each card: product photo, name, price. Rounded card with subtle shadow on white surface.

components.name: Donate — CTA Panel
components.description: Centred panel on surfaceAlt with a heartfelt one-paragraph message, amount context, and PayPal donate button in accent green. Rounded-lg corners.

components.name: Social — Icon Links
components.description: Simple centred row of social media icons (Instagram, YouTube, Facebook) with hover animation. Sits above footer.

components.name: Language Switcher
components.description: Minimal pill-style toggle in the top nav: ET | RU | EN. Understated so it doesn't clutter but easy to find.
